text: Thomas Ponce Gill (April 21, 1922 - June 3, 2009) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from 1963 to 1965. He was the fourth lieutenant governor of Hawaii from 1966 to 1970. He unsuccessfully ran for governor twice, in 1970 and 1974.
